title: Apparently people think that petty tiny insults or typing a paragraph or 2
body:
warrants perma bans or any punishment in this game. 

People actually think that saying someone sucks or this team is awful or writing 2 paragraphs (which takes like a minute and is in no way an all game typing thing of ranting should result in all the work and all the money spent on this game lost because someone got frustrated and said something petty. People here are actually thinking its ok to cost people 20-thousands of dollars and hours because of what? something a mute button can prevent? I would agree with them if the person was racist or sexist or the equivalent of that. But no on in this entire game should ever be punished EVER for something petty. There is no excuse any of you can give to justify ANYTHING like that. No matter what. MAYBE if it was a majority of the games played but not in in 1-5 games.

Basically you all think if your feelings EVER get hurt it is justified for the person who hurt them should be removed with no chance ever to hurt them again. Riot i think your system could use some work. Cater less to the 2 year olds.

And yes it's technically true that if you aren't good at something, it's more logical from a game-winning point of view, to have someone better do it. But this is a video game. We ultimately should play to entertain ourselves.

Most of the things you said were mildly toxic. But they build up. When you're mildly toxic over multiple games, it will lead to a punishment.

> warrants perma bans or any punishment in this game.

No one here thinks that this alone warrants you a permaban. What we think warrants a permaban is this COMBINED with whatever  your previous offences has been. You don't get permabanned for toxicity as the first punishment. You have at the very least 1 more chance. Most cases you get 2-3 chances. If you waste those chances, then you are showing yourself incapable of reforming.
Its not about hurt feelings, we just want the negativity off our screen when we're trying to play a VIDEO GAME. If youre salty about something, take a break, or even better, just uninstall
